About Me

Hi! I'm Vinh. I'm currently a graduate student studying physics. My interests include: astrophysics, condensed matter and material science. I like learning new things each day!

Graduate Electrodynamics - Spring 2022

Teaching Assistant : Problem Sets and Midterm Solutions

Graduate Quantum Mechanics 1 - Fall 2021

Formalism, One Dimensional Problems, Time Evolution, Angular Momentum

Graduate Quantum Mechanics 2 - Spring 2022

Approximation Methods, Scattering
